StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: dbGaP Collection: Psychiatric Genomics Consortium (PGC) dbGaP Datasets

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: When citing this collection, use the acknowledgement statement(s) from the individual dataset(s) downloaded and utilized.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: GSR does not apply (ONLY for studies that will not have genomic data in dbGaP)

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use
ConsentGroup.name: GRU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Bipolar Disorder, GSO)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-BPD-GSO
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Bipolar Disorder. Use of the data is limited to genetic studies only.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Bipolar Disorder, GSO, RD)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-BPD-GSO-RD
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Bipolar Disorder and related disorders. Use of the data is limited to genetic studies only.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Schizophrenia and related disorders, GSO)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-SZRD-GSO
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Schizophrenia and related disorders. Use of the data is limited to genetic studies only.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Attention deficit hyperactive disorder, GSO)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-ADHD-GSO
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Attention deficit hyperactive disorder. Use of the data is limited to genetic studies only.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Attention deficit hyperactive disorder, RD)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-ADHD-RD
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Attention deficit hyperactive disorder and related disorders.

ConsentGroup.title: Health Research
ConsentGroup.name: HR
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: May be used for genetic studies to learn about, prevent, or treat health problems.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Alcoholism, GSO, RD)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-ALC-GSO-RD
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Alcoholism and related disorders. Use of the data is limited to genetic studies only.
